item.description:
To the surprise of many folks outside of New England, the Patriots have managed to put themselves in position to make the playoffs. But in order to make it, they have to get past Buffalo. And while the Patriots have won 10 straight games against the Bills (tied for the second longest regular-season winning streak against an opponent in team history and is the third longest current winning streak against an opponent in the NFL), you know the Bills would love to knock Matt Cassel and company out of the running.

This is one game I don't plan to miss, so come join me to cheer on the pats and get your game on!

Game starts at 1 PM, so lets plan on meeting a bit before to grab seats and mix and mingle a bit.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell to Yes and Maybee RSVPs in the AM
item.name: Are You Ready for Some Football
